item.title: Product documentation and information architecture
item.description:
Context

Redocly makes API design and documentation software with the goal to improve the writer and developer experience.

As Redocly’s first Technical Writer Advocate, the goal of this role was to help the community of technical writers by advocating for a docs-like-code approach and offering them the skills and know-how for how to make it happen.
